attributes.action: I want schools to teach sign language.
attributes.additional_details: I think that the government should do this, to teach secondary year 7-8 basic sign language for them to be able to gain some skills in which would help people who are deaf understand and also to make people aware.
attributes.background: I want the government to either consider or to make this legal. I would like schools to teach basic sign language, as people that are deaf struggle to understand people in which isn’t their fault. They (deaf people) cannot get around daily life without it.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576713
